Wendy

ウェンディWENDI

"How can people seem to fly through the sky?"
R

The story of a young girl who begins to fly after meeting Peter Pan one night.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version featured on Haiten★Girl 2.
  • a court of greed version: A revised version with updated vocals featured on Judgment of Corruption ~a court of greed~.

Albums

Notes

  • The iconography on the lyrics page for the song in Judgment of Corruption ~a court of greed~ indicates that the song takes place in Marlon.
